languages.text: Злокозненный и жесткий капитан их, владетель звездного челна "Навиика", сотворил предательство — спустиши опекаемых им чад на поверхность мира, коварно призвал к себе шаттлы свои и отбыл, избавиши себя от заботы о сирых сих.

Their wicked and cruel captain, the owner of the Naviica, had betrayed them; once the unknowing souls in his care had made landfall on the world's surface, he most deviously recalled his shuttles and left, thus ridding himself of his duty of care to the unfortunate lot.
languages.original_text: Злокозненный и жесткий капитан их, владетель звездного челна "Навиика", сотворил предательство — спустиши опекаемых им чад на поверхность мира, коварно призвал к себе шаттлы свои и отбыл, избавиши себя от заботы о сирых сих.

traits.locale_text: Their wicked and cruel captain, the owner of the Naviica, had betrayed them; once the unknowing souls in his care had made landfall on the world's surface, he most deviously recalled his shuttles and left, thus ridding himself of his duty of care for the unfortunate lot.

Their wicked and cruel captain, the owner of the Naviica, had betrayed them; once the unknowing souls in his care had made landfall on the world's surface, he most deviously recalled his shuttles and left, thus ridding himself of his duty of care for the unfortunate lot.

Their wicked and cruel captain, the owner of the Naviica, had betrayed them; once the unknowing souls in his care had made landfall on the world's surface, he most deviously recalled his shuttles and left, thus ridding himself of his duty of care to the unfortunate lot.

Their wicked and cruel captain, the owner of the Naviica, had betrayed them; once the unknowing souls in his care had made landfall on the world's surface, he most deviously recalled his shuttles and left, thus ridding himself of his duty of care to the unfortunate lot.

Their wicked and cruel captain, the owner of the Naviica, had betrayed them; once the unknowing souls in his care had made landfall on the world's surface, he most deviously recalled his shuttles and left, thus ridding himself of his duty of care to the unfortunate lot.

languages.text: El malvado y cruel capitán, propietario de la Naviica, los había traicionado. Una vez las almas cándidas a su cuidado pusieron pie en la superficie de ese mundo, hizo volver arteramente a sus lanzaderas y se marchó, abandonando su deber de proteger a esos desdichados.
languages.original_text: Their wicked and cruel captain, the owner of the Naviica, had betrayed them; once the unknowing souls in his care had made landfall on the world's surface, he most deviously recalled his shuttles and left, thus ridding himself of his duty of care to the unfortunate lot.

traits.locale_text: El malvado y cruel capitán, propietario de la Naviica, los había traicionado. Una vez las almas cándidas a su cuidado pusieron pie en la superficie de ese mundo, hizo volver arteramente a sus lanzaderas y se marchó, abandonando su deber de proteger a esos desdichados.

languages.text: 他们乘坐纳维卡号来此，邪恶而无情的舰长却背叛了他们。当这群一无所知的可怜人在这个世界登陆之后，阴险的舰长召回了他的登陆艇，一走了之，将这些不幸的人们弃之不顾。
languages.original_text: Their wicked and cruel captain, the owner of the Naviica, had betrayed them; once the unknowing souls in his care had made landfall on the world's surface, he most deviously recalled his shuttles and left, thus ridding himself of his duty of care to the unfortunate lot.

traits.locale_text: 他们乘坐纳维卡号来此，邪恶而无情的舰长却背叛了他们。当这群一无所知的可怜人在这个世界登陆之后，阴险的舰长召回了他的登陆艇，一走了之，将这些不幸的人们弃之不顾。

languages.text: ナヴィーカ号の持ち主、極悪非道の船長は宣教師達を裏切った。船長の保護化にあった無垢なる魂達が地上に降り立つと、狡猾にもシャトルを撤収させて、不幸な魂達を保護する責任から解放され、立ち去ったのだ。
languages.original_text: Their wicked and cruel captain, the owner of the Naviica, had betrayed them; once the unknowing souls in his care had made landfall on the world's surface, he most deviously recalled his shuttles and left, thus ridding himself of his duty of care to the unfortunate lot.

traits.locale_text: ナヴィーカ号の持ち主、極悪非道の船長は宣教師達を裏切った。船長の保護化にあった無垢なる魂達が地上に降り立つと、狡猾にもシャトルを撤収させて、不幸な魂達を保護する責任から解放され、立ち去ったのだ。

languages.text: Doch ihr tückischer und grausamer Captain, der Besitzer der Naviica, ließ sie im Stich. Als die ahnungslosen Seelen in seiner Obhut auf der Oberfläche des Planeten landeten, beorderte er seine Shuttles zurück und entzog sich seiner Pflicht, für seine beklagenswerten Leute zu sorgen.
languages.original_text: Their wicked and cruel captain, the owner of the Naviica, had betrayed them; once the unknowing souls in his care had made landfall on the world's surface, he most deviously recalled his shuttles and left, thus ridding himself of his duty of care to the unfortunate lot.

traits.locale_text: Doch ihr tückischer und grausamer Captain, der Besitzer der Naviica, ließ sie im Stich. Als die ahnungslosen Seelen in seiner Obhut auf der Oberfläche des Planeten landeten, beorderte er seine Shuttles zurück und entzog sich seiner Pflicht, für seine beklagenswerten Leute zu sorgen.

languages.text: Leur vil capitaine, le propriétaire du Naviica, les a trahies. À peine les pauvres âmes dont il avait la charge ont-elles posé le pied à la surface qu'il rappelait sournoisement ses navettes et disparaissait, se déchargeant ainsi de son devoir d'assistance.
languages.original_text: Their wicked and cruel captain, the owner of the Naviica, had betrayed them; once the unknowing souls in his care had made landfall on the world's surface, he most deviously recalled his shuttles and left, thus ridding himself of his duty of care to the unfortunate lot.

traits.locale_text: Leur vil capitaine, le propriétaire du Naviica, les a trahies. À peine les pauvres âmes dont il avait la charge ont-elles posé le pied à la surface qu'il rappelait sournoisement ses navettes et disparaissait, se déchargeant ainsi de son devoir d'assistance.

languages.text: Naviica'nın sahibi olan kötü yürekli ve zalim kaptanları onlara ihanet etmiş; himayesi altındaki bihaber insanlar dünyanın yüzeyine iniş yaptıktan sonra haince bir hamleyle mekikleri geri çağırmış ve oradan uzaklaşmış, bu sayede de bu talihsiz güruha olan yükümlülüğünü üzerinden atmış.
languages.original_text: Their wicked and cruel captain, the owner of the Naviica, had betrayed them; once the unknowing souls in his care had made landfall on the world's surface, he most deviously recalled his shuttles and left, thus ridding himself of his duty of care to the unfortunate lot.

traits.locale_text: Naviica'nın sahibi olan kötü yürekli ve zalim kaptanları onlara ihanet etmiş; himayesi altındaki bihaber insanlar dünyanın yüzeyine iniş yaptıktan sonra haince bir hamleyle mekikleri geri çağırmış ve oradan uzaklaşmış, bu sayede de bu talihsiz güruha olan yükümlülüğünü üzerinden atmış.
